name: Tim's Planet 3D
blurb: This was my first expirement using React Thee Fiber to create a fully immersive 3d experience. The goal was to create a portfolio website where people could explore a 3d world and get to know more about me by interacting with landmarks.

name: Ghouls Gambit!
blurb: My submission for the Halloween 2024 threejs-journey.com challange! This is a 3d shooter game where your goal is to protect the local townsfolk from a horde of ghosts, skeletons, and zombies. Check it out!
